title: Jerky screen when wake up from lock screen after update to Android 11
content:
When I double tap or raise the phone to wake up the screen from lock, the screen is jerky and shows the previous time for a fraction of second before it's display the current time on home screen. This happened after updating to Android 11 recently. Until then it's was very smooth visually pleasant. 
Am I missing any settings after updating to 11?
